#define PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE   128

Number of bits in the bit field.

Function Documentation

void pizItemset128SetAtIndex ( PIZItemset128 *  itemset,
long  index 
)

At specified index, set/let the bit to 1.

Parameters:
itemset A valid pointer.
index The index (zero-based).
Warning:
For efficiency the index is NOT checked ; so crash may occur with invalid indexing.

At specified index, get the value of a bit.
